content.rendered: Audit Manager Tulsa area CPA firm seeking qualified Audit Manager for developing the division. CPA firm is renowned for its great work environment! The firm strives to create a culture of inclusion and team work, with open communication between all levels. In additional to the following technical skills, the agency is seeking candidates with a strong vision for their client as well as employer, with the ability to demonstrate business development experience and strong managerial skills.   Required: CPA with 5+ years public accounting (audit) experience. Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, with graduate studies preferred. Ability to work with a diversity of clients and colleagues, welcoming dialogue from all levels.   Compensation will vary based on background and experience.
